bibl.title: Garments in Documentary Papyri from Egypt.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Selected garments and their attributes: καμίσιον; - μαφόριον; - στιχάριον; - λινούδιον; - ὀθόνιον; - σινδόνιον; - κολόβιον. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Methods of Dating Ancient Textiles of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt and Neighbouring Countries. Proceedings of the 4th Meeting of the Study Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 16-17 April 2005

bibl.seg: FROSCHAUER Harald, Garments in Documentary Papyri from Egypt.

Antoine DE MOOR and Cäcilia FLUCK, assisted by Susanne MARTINSSEN-VON FALCK (Edd.), Methods of Dating Ancient Textiles of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt and Neighbouring Countries. Proceedings of the 4th Meeting of the Study Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 16-17 April 2005 (Tielt, 2007) pp. 230-235, 4 tabl., 1 pl. coul.
1. Introduction. - 2. Selected garments and their attributes: καμίσιον; - μαφόριον; - στιχάριον; - λινούδιον; - ὀθόνιον; - σινδόνιον; - κολόβιον. - Conclusion.
